title: Need essence
body: Hi league boards. I am currently 61 essence away from being able to unlock brolaf from hextech crafting. Is there a way I can get a rioter to help me out here? Thanks{{champion:2}}

replies.body: We don't currently provide free content like essences, but you can still get them by unlocking [hextech chests](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide)!  Get some S masteries with champions you own for a few chests, and hopefully you will nab some essences or a disenchant!  Crack open a graggy ice, and get some Brolaf in your life!
Okay thank you. Just to clarify you guys do give small amounts of RP though, right? A quick google search says so but I just wanted to make sure
